Quantum Workshop 2020

The one-day workshop Current Trends in Quantum Information Processing was held virtually on 24th July, and hosted at SPCOM 2020. It had active participation from the Quantum Computing thematic cluster at IISc, and the Centre for Excellence in Quantum Technology supported by the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology, Government of India.

Invited talks and Panel discussion

Theoretical Reflections on Quantum Supremacy
Keynote Speaker: Umesh Vazirani, University of California at Berkeley
Quantum Information Processing over Quantum Network
Keynote Speaker: Masahito Hayashi, Shenzhen Institute for Quantum Science and Engineering, Southern University of Science and Technology, Shenzhen, China
Overview of Superconducting Quantum Devices
Speaker: Vibhor Singh, Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore
Introduction to Atom Interferometers and Atomic Clocks
Speaker: Umakant Rapol, Indian Institute of Science Education and Research (IISER), Pune
Practical Quantum Communication
Speaker: Anil Prabhakar, Indian Institute of Technology, Madras
Entanglement based Quantum networks
Speaker: Siddarth Joshi, University of Bristol
Quantum Illumination
Speaker: Saikat Guha, College of Optical Sciences, University of Arizona,Tucson, AZ
Panel Discussion : "Prospects for Quantum Technology Development in India"
Speakers: Apoorva Patel (IISc, Bangalore), Umakant Rapol (IISER, Pune), Anil Prabhakar (IIT Madras), R. P. Singh (PRL, Ahmedabad), Manojkumar Parmar (Robert Bosch Engineering and Business Solutions, Bangalore)

Organizers:
Vinod Sharma, Department of Electrical Communication Engineering, IISc
Apoorva D Patel, Centre for High Energy Physics, IISc
Y. Narahari, Department of Computer Science and Automation, IISc
Arindam Khan, Department of Computer Science and Automation, IISc
Varun Raghunathan, Department of Electrical Communication Engineering, IISc
Chetan Singh Thakur, Department of Electronic Systems Engineering, IISc

Event Sponsor: Division of Electrical, Electronics, and Computer Sciences (EECS), Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore
